alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:51PM EST until January 11 at 4:49PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of piedmont North Carolina, including the following county, Cabarrus. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to remain elevated due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 549 PM EST, Flooding is continuing along the Rocky River although river levels will continue to fall. The river is expected to return to within its banks later this evening. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
